title: 1 dead, 3 injured in Salem strip club shooting
content:
SALEM, Ore. -- A man was killed and three others were injured in a shooting at a Salem strip club early Saturday morning.
Police received a call shortly before 1 a.m. that shots were fired at Stars Cabaret, located at 1550 Weston Ct. NE, according to Lt. Dave Okada. When officers arrived they found four victims.
One of the victims, identified as Darryl Patrick Jones, 47, of Salem, later died at Salem Hospital, Okada said.
The identities of the other victims were not revealed.
Detectives believe the shooting was targeted, and stemmed from an altercation with one of the victims, Okada said.
The suspect is described as a bald, stocky Hispanic man in his 20s or 30s, according to police.
Anyone with information is asked to call the Salem Police Department at 503-588-6123.
